message.name: ERR_RESPONSESCORE_FV_RESPONSE_SCORE_IS_INVALID
message.locale: The 'Score' entered is invalid.It must be a whole number.

message.name: ERR_RESPONSESCORE_XFV_ATLEAST_ONE_RESPONSE_SCORE_REQUIRED_TO_CREATE
message.locale: At least one response and score must be entered.

message.name: ERR_RESPONSESCORE_XRV_RESPONSE_SCORE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Score for the responses, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_RESPONSESCORE_XRV_CRITERION_CANCELED_RESPONSE_SCORE_CANNOT_ADD
message.locale: The criterion, '%1s' is '%2c',the scores can not be added.
